message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $175. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $137.50. This is still a good deal for you, and it allows me to make a fair profit.  What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
